III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) The facility is in compliance with all ISEP requirements.
3.) The facility does not contract with MDHHS.
IV. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
There were no rule violations cited in the Interim Inspection of 2019. There
were no repeat violations or corrective action plans submitted during this
licensing period.
V. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes, rules and ISEP requirements. It is recommended that the facility be issued a
renewal of their regular license.
